titles.title: CCP Act
CCP Act
Cranes of Concern at our Ports Act
A bill to require the Director of National Intelligence to conduct an assessment of the threat posed to United States ports by cranes manufactured by countries of concern, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Select Committee on Intelligence.

bill.summary:
Cranes of Concern at our Ports Act or the CCP Act
This bill requires the Office of the Director of National Intelligence (ODNI) to assess the threat posed to U.S. ports by cranes manufactured by certain countries (such as China, Russia, and Iran) and commercial entities in those countries, including Shanghai Zhenhua Heavy Industries Co. The bill also requires the ODNI to submit a report and provide a briefing to Congress on the findings of the assessment.
